import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import Bottle from "../../images/beer-bottle.png"; const CountModal = ({ product, setProductsChange }) => { const addPartial = async (id) => { try { const body = { id, quantity }; const response = await fetch( `http://localhost:5000/stocklists/addpartial`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(body), } ); await response.json(); setProductsChange(true); } catch (err) { console.error(err.message); } }; const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState([]); return (

{product.product_name}

 ); }; export default CountModal;
